name: 2D Dungeon Project
description:
This is my project of an editable game of dungeons, it brings a variety of things like: final boss, shop, enemy room, soon more things :D

I have to inform you that the project is designed for Clickteam fusion 2.5

The project contains a variety of things, such as coins, which can be obtained by killing the enemies.

Something I love about this is to be able to destroy the spawners of the enemies.

when you destroy one of these explode shooting 4 bullets to different directions.

and let's not forget that the spawns also drop coins and...

This works like this...

The key system is super simple, if you do not have the key you can not leave the room, when you get the key (in this case in the spawner), you must collide with the door to open it.

When you talk to the seller he will tell you if you want to buy a safeguard or life

The safeguard is an active object that is used when pressing space, what this object does is to clear the room of bullets (In case you are in a complicated situation and you can not dodge the bullets). It is recommended for the final boss.

What life does, well emm... we already know that hehe...

(To the left of each object tells you the price).

I will not give details about the boss because otherwise this would be eternal... And it would be good if you discover it :)

So far my project, I hope you like it and can use it for your games. (I will try to check out updates)
